means: 校订，修改( emend的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: The text was emended in the second edition.
sentence.Network_cn: 文字在第二版中得到修订.

sentence.Network_en: The conclusion could direct the emended design of the cartridge case solving the real engineering problems.
sentence.Network_cn: 本文提出的改进措施为药筒的改进设计指出了方向,解决了工程实际问题.

sentence.Network_en: In the august of 1999, National Curriculum was emended roundly from environmental education to BSD.
sentence.Network_cn: 1999年秋季, 英国政府对国家课程进行了全面修订,由环境教育转向可持续发展教育.
